replies.author: a555128
a555128

replies.txt_content:
楼主你嚎啊！自己找一下领地插件里面的这个吧XZY的高度...看不懂度娘翻译吧= =
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 50
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 50
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 2500

replies.author: mmmmmmmm丶浅瞳
replies.txt_content:
给你一个详细的
只求人气。

首先打开插件文件夹/plugins

找到里面的Residence  文件夹

打开之后里面有一个Config.yml文件

使用Notepad++  这个软件打开 

然后找到这些代码

           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
MaxEastWest: 99999
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
MaxNorthSouth: 99999
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
MaxUpDown: 256


找到这几行代码改成这样就行了。
